message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers a lot of value and would be perfect for you. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is already a very competitive price for what the product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I understand the value of the product, but I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $110?
